title: Homicide - Person Of Interest | Baltimore County Police Department (3/24/21)
author: Official Baltimore County Police & Fire
description:
Person of interest in Murder Case Sought by Baltimore County Detectives 
 
Homicide detectives with the Baltimore County Police Department are asking for the public’s help to identify a person of interest who was caught on a surveillance camera the night of the killing in question. 

Detectives believe the person of interest may have valuable information in the murder of Lashawnda Sanders.  The 43-year-old woman was found murdered during the early morning hours of November 29, 2020.  

The 32 second video recording shows the person of interest walking up and down the hallway where Sander’s room was located.  

Baltimore County Police Detectives:
410-307-2020

Metro Crime Stoppers:
1-866-7LOCKUP
